name: 💡 A Simple Function
description: Get started by writing a simple function that is callable from your spreadsheet.
code:
def add(a, b):
    return a + b

name: 🧑‍💻 Fetch Some Data
description: Add a UI to your spreadsheet using Streamlit
code:
import requests


def get_posts():
 url = "https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts"

 response = requests.get(url)
 response.raise_for_status()
 return [[post["userId"], post["title"]] for post in response.json()]

name: 🚀 A Custom UI
